title: URAファイナルズ予選の後に

text.jpText:
見事ッ！
予選通過、おめでとうっ！

ファンの期待を一身に受けたウマ娘たちが、
自身の1番輝ける舞台で競い合う……。
text.enText:
The Uma Musume, who have received the 
highest expectations from their fans, 
will compete on the stage where they 
can shine the brightest. ……

text.jpText:
観ている人々は無論、走り抜いた子らも
なんと満足な顔をしていることか！
text.enText:
What a satisfying sight to see, not only for 
those watching, but also for the kids who 
made it through!

text.jpText:
重畳ッ！　『URAファイナルズ』に
求めていたのはまさにこれだ！
text.enText:
Superimposed! This is exactly what I was 
looking for in "URA Finals"!

text.jpText:
さあ、次は予選を勝ち抜いた強豪と
競うことになるが――自信はどうだ！？
text.enText:
Now, you'll be competing against the best of 
the best who made it through the preliminary 
rounds―how confident are you?

choices.jpText: 次も必ず勝ってみせます！
choices.enText: I'll make sure we win again next time!

text.jpText:
激励ッ！
期待しているぞ、熱きレースを！
text.enText: Pep talk! We're counting on you, hotshot!
